mapper.select: SELECT distinct menuBtn.* from sy_user_role usrRole JOIN sy_role_perm rolePerm on usrRole.role_id=rolePerm.role_id JOIN sy_menu_btn menuBtn on rolePerm.menu_btn_id=menuBtn.id JOIN sy_menu menu on menuBtn.menu_id=menu.id where usrRole.user_id=#{userId} and menuBtn.`name`!='list' and menu.id=#{menuId} and menuBtn.is_visible=1
